analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna duka ādi

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ no citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhānaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhum dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ no citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhū dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattim dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ no citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattī dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha
